historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-378, see notes following § 16-4604.01.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 5 of the Uniform Child Abduction Prevention Act. See Vol. 9, Pt. 1A, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 16-4604.05

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A petition under this subchapter may be filed only in a court that has jurisdiction to make a child-custody determination with respect to the child at issue under §§ 16-4601.01 to 16-4604.02.
A court of this state has temporary emergency jurisdiction under § 16- 4602.04 if the court finds a credible risk of abduction.

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Uniform Child-Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement. (Refs & Annos)
